verses.roman:
vṛkṣera upare śākhā haila dui skandha
eka 'advaita' nāma, āra 'nityānanda'

synonyms: vṛkṣera—of the tree; upare—on the top; śākhā—branch; haila—became; dui—two; skandha—trunks; eka—one; advaita—Śrī Advaita Prabhu; nāma—of the name; āra—and; nityānanda—of the name Nityānanda Prabhu.
translation: At the top of the tree the trunk branched into two. One trunk was named Śrī Advaita Prabhu and the other Śrī Nityānanda Prabhu.
